page.title: 02LOCAL AMENITIES
page.content: People living in Loxley make good use of the local amenities, which include playgroups, youth clubs, Mobile Library, Ladies Group, Brownies and Cubs. Few people attend church. Many families have videos and computers, and the majority have cars. Most people enjoy holidays both abroad and in the British Isles. There are few jobs in the Loxley area, and most people travel at least 3 miles to work.A small percentage of the population is unemployed,a small percentage retired. {Loxley House,}built in 1826, is a large three storeyed house with wide bay windows in Venetian style.The house and large grounds are now used for Sea Cadet training.Wisewood School use the grounds for sports.
